title: Job Openings at Transsion Holdings
content:
Transsion Holdings, the company formerly known as TECNO TELECOM LIMITED, established in July 2006, is a high-tech company specializing in the R&D, production, sale and service of mobile communication products. After years of development, Transsion has become an important part of the mobile phone industry and one of the major mobile phone manufacturers in the world. Currently, it has full ownership of three famous mobile phone brands TECNO, itel and Infinix, and an after-sales service brand Carlcare.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Solar Technician

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Install, test, and commission solar PV systems, including panels, inverters, batteries, and charge controllers.
	Conduct regular preventive and corrective maintenance on installed solar systems.
	Diagnose and resolve technical faults related to system performance, wiring, or equipment.
	Perform site evaluations and load assessments to determine system requirements.
	Ensure all installations meet company standards, manufacturer specifications, and relevant electrical codes.
	Keep accurate records of system installations, inspections, and repairs.
	Provide technical support and guidance to customers regarding system operation and maintenance.
	Collaborate with engineers and project managers to ensure timely project completion.
	Maintain tools, equipment, and safety gear in good working condition.


Requirements


	OND / HND qualification / B.Sc Degree in Electrical Engineering, Renewable Energy, or a related field.
	3 – 5 years of proven experience in solar system installation and maintenance.
	Strong understanding of electrical systems and solar energy principles.
	Experience with hybrid and off-grid solar systems is an added advantage.
	Ability to read and interpret electrical diagrams and installation manuals.
	Knowledge of safety standards and compliance requirements.
	Good communication and problem-solving skills.
	Physically fit and comfortable working at heights.


Application Closing Date: 27th October, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: adebayo.deborah@transsion.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Product Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	The Product Manager is responsible for driving the overall strategy, performance, and profitability of assigned products.
	This role involves developing and executing go-to-market plans, conducting market and competitor analysis, collaborating cross-functionally with sales, marketing, and supply chain teams, and ensuring that products meet customer needs and organizational objectives.
	The Product Manager serves as the product expert and acts as the main liaison between internal stakeholders and the market.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute marketing and sales strategies to achieve product revenue, profitability, and market share goals.
	Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify industry trends, customer needs, and opportunities for product growth.
	Monitor product performance metrics (sell-in, sell-out, ROI) and recommend data-driven corrective actions.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Sales, Marketing, Retail, Training, and Supply Chain) to ensure effective product positioning and successful go-to-market execution.
	Manage product life cycle, including pricing, forecasting, inventory planning, and stock rotation, to optimize profitability and minimize obsolescence.
	Serve as the primary contact for all matters related to assigned products, ensuring seamless communication and coordination across departments.
	Train sales promoters and regional teams on product features, selling points, and customer engagement techniques.
	Develop and manage promotional plans, campaigns, and launch strategies to maximize brand visibility and sales.
	Analyze customer behavior, feedback, and satisfaction levels to enhance product positioning and improve user experience.
	Provide regular product reports, insights, and market feedback to management for informed decision-making.
	Support budgeting and forecasting processes, ensuring cost-effectiveness and efficient resource allocation.


Requirement


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Economics, or a related field (Master’s degree or MBA is an advantage).
	2–7 years of relevant experience in product management, marketing, or brand management.
	Strong analytical, research, and strategic planning skills.
	Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal abilities.
	Proficiency in MS Office Suite and data analysis tools; experience with CRM or ERP systems is an added advantage.
	Ability to multitask, manage timelines, and work collaboratively across departments.
	Demonstrated ability to translate consumer insights into actionable business strategies.


Application Closing Date: 16th October, 2025.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their detailed CV to: oyeleke.adebimpe@transsion.com using Job Position as the subject of the mail.

 

3.)  Audio Annotator (English / Hausa)

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for detail-oriented and language-proficient individuals to join our AI Data team as Audio Annotators.
	The successful candidate will be responsible for listening to, transcribing, labeling, and reviewing audio data in either English or Hausa.
	This role supports the development of speech recognition and natural language processing systems.


Key Responsibilities


	Annotate and label text data in English and Hausa according to project-specific guidelines (e.g., intent classification, entity tagging, sentiment, slot filling, etc.)
	Review, validate, and refine AI-generated annotations to ensure high quality and consistency
	Coordinate with NLP engineers and linguists to resolve ambiguous or complex annotation cases
	Document annotation decisions, flag patterns or issues, and suggest improvements to guidelines
	Perform quality assurance checks to maintain high inter-annotator agreement.


Requirements


	Experience with annotation tools/platforms (e.g., Labelbox, Prodigy, custom tools) is a plus Degree in Linguistics, Computational Linguistics, AI, or a related field is preferred.
	At least 1 year of experience in NLU, NLP, or data annotation role involving intents, entities, or conversational understanding
	Native or near-native fluency in both Hausa and English (written + spoken), with strong grammar and cultural nuance understanding
	Strong linguistic background: familiarity with syntax, semantic roles,NER, etc.
	Attention to detail, critical thinking, and ability to work with large datasets.


Salary
N150,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 16th October, 2025.

Click here to apply online

Since its inception, Jubilee-Life Mortgage Bank Plc has evolved into a mortgage Bank with a global outlook whose activities have extended beyond the shores of Nigeria. The Bank has attained significant growth and emerged as a giant in the mortgage banking sector in terms of assets, loans, deposits, profitability, and branch network. We attribute our success to our commitment to deliver safe, viable, and affordable housing solutions which address the housing deficit in Nigeria.
     

            
    



Owing to Nigeria’s exponential population growth, the need to deliver affordable houses for individuals within Nigerian societies cannot be overemphasized. As a result, Jubilee-Life Mortgage Bank Plc strives to meet the identified need. Our expertise in the mortgage banking industry gives us leverage in our quest to alleviate the myriad challenges hindering national housing development.

We are deliberate in our approach with a long-term strategy to address stakeholders’ needs by providing innovative and affordable mortgage products and services to low-middle income earners.

Jubilee-Life Mortgage Bank Plc is birthed out of a kingdom mandate by the Redeemed Christian Church God (RCCG) with a vision to assist with the growing housing need. Jubilee-Life Mortgage Bank Plc have its operations centered on core values of professionalism, integrity, and excellence.

The Bank engages in retail banking operations through acceptance of savings and term deposits, acceptance of mortgage-focused deposits, mortgage finance, mortgage advisory services, drawing from mortgage funds for on-lending, and other financial activities as permitted by the Central Bank of Nigeria. Jubilee-Life Mortgage Bank Plc has financed thousands of notable low-cost housing projects/small to medium enterprise projects in various states of the nation including Lagos, Abuja, Port Harcourt, Oyo, and Ogun to mention a few.

As a result of excellent service delivery, the Bank has bagged several awards including; Nigeria Best Property Development Finance Company of the Year 2007, West African Best Customer Service Mortgage Finance Company of the Year 2008, National Integrated Quality Mortgage Banking Company of the Year 2009, West African Branding Merit Award for Mortgage Banking Excellence, African Order of Merit in the Finance & Acquisition of Property in 2011, Integrity in Mortgage Business of the year 2017, Most Reliable Mortgage Bank of the year 2017 amongst others.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:
